actions.recommendation: Abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also around the organs of your abdomen, linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, get good sleep ,try manage stress

Stress ECG: 1mm ST depression in inferior and anterior leads in recovery phase, no reciprocal changes. Discuss with family doctor. An annual bone density screen for osteoporosis and colonoscopy for colon cancer is recommended from age 50.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
